name: Operation Optics
description:
WINR Games' primary purpose is to provide a fun, engaging and enriching experience for all of our users!

We do not encourage you to play our games solely to earn money or prizes. Cash and prizes are a secondary bonus feature of Operation Optics, but we want you to focus on the fun of the game just like other games.

How the cash prize draw works:

Collect at least one ticket to be entered into the frequent cash prize draws. Check back at draw time to see if your name is on the winning ticket. The winning prize is paid out through Paypal.

Very simply, we value our user's loyalty and every draw we are sharing back. We have already given away thousands of dollars to lucky players.

So what are you waiting for? Download Operation Optics today for FREE!

Have questions, problems, or feedback? Reach out to us at support@winrgames.com
